item.name: Notifications

request.description: Get all notifications for a user, along with their unread notification count

request.description: Updates the read status of a notification

item.name: Flights

response.name: Flight Search one-way
Flight Search round trip

item.description: Demonstrates the variations of the flight search for fly next, which requires an origin, destination corresponding to an airport or city. Requires two validate dates for round trip and one for one way, formatted 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

item.name: Booking
item.description: Can create, cancel, and verify flight and/or hotel bookings. Needs booking IDs for cancellation and verification.

item.name: Auth
item.description: Uses JWT tokens for authentication and stores user ID to validate throughout the app.
